title: PLEASE PLEASE - Multiple offending TROLL STILL PLAYING.  Nothing I can do to win a game like this
body:
Watch the first 10 minutes of my last game.

Please take the time to watch Riven.  Not sure if you can read what she says in chat.  But her sole intention entering the game was to lose.  This is unacceptable.  I have reported this person multiple times to no avail.

Yet if I were to call him a snowflake, I risk being banned.  WHAT IS WRONG IN THIS GAMING LEADERSHIP AT RIOT?

replies.body: Multiple? Did you have more games with them or are you assuming it is multiple?

I see this guy 2 to 3 times a week, and report every time.

Yet here is is, again.

Please tell me how I am supposed to maintain a legit 55% win rate, when I have 3 of these type of players on my team every day?  They are automatic losses.  

I Que solo.  So essentially if I want to climb, I HAVE to:

1.  Have a dedicated duo partner in attempt to mitigate this some.
2  Spend money on a leveling service to get one of these Gold / Plat / Diamond dirtbags to boost my MMR.  Feeding this trolling problem even further.

He's been making these threads for a few days, and from what I can see, he does actually get an abnormally high number of people intentionally feeding on his team.

Check this one out man.  I had a Riven on my team - 37-0.  Ahri on the other team - like 48 -0.  After about 25 minutes, Riven goes off and hides in the jg, to reveal location.  

They has similar names.  loli wife and loli GF or something like that.  I reported.  Again.  But I'm sure I will see this lvling service soon, again.

Fortunately for my team, I can sniff this behavior out a mile away now.  We stayed focused, dragged the game out to an eternity so that we were all full build.  Then won.  

A special shout out to the J4 who went 2-25.  No way we can pull this delay strategy without you.

Does this sound like a fun ranked match to anyone?  
Just check my game history.  This is as obvious as it gets.
